DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , multi-center , open label , non-randomized study , evaluate treat medial meniscus deficiency NUsurface Meniscus Implant .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Medial Meniscus With NUsurface ( R ) Meniscus Implant
DOC.criteria: 1 . Have degenerative and/or torn meniscus and/or previous meniscectomy confirm diagnostic MRI . 2 . Have pain score 75 less KOOS pain scale , 100 normal . 3 . Be neutral alignment +/ 5 degree mechanical axis . 4 . Be age 35 75 time plan surgery . 5 . Be able fit anatomically size 30 90 NUsurface® device . 6 . Have normal mental status . 7 . Be willing able attend follow visit , complete study questionnaire , undergo require Xray MRI schedule . 8 . Be able willing understand sign inform consent form . 1 . Have evidence Grade IV articular cartilage loss medial tibial plateau femoral condyle could contact NUsurface implant 2 . Have lateral compartment pain lateral articular cartilage damage great Grade II ( OB ) , and/or lateral meniscus tear ( ) 3 . Have varus valgus knee deformity > 5 degree . 4 . Have laxity level II ( ICRS ) , secondary previous injury anterior cruciate ligament ( ACL ) and/or posterior cruciate ligament ( PCL ) and/or lateral collateral ligament ( LCL ) and/or medial collateral ligament ( MCL ) . 5 . Have patella instability nonanatomically position patella 6 . Have patellar compartment pain and/or patellar articular cartilage damage great Grade II ( OB ) . 7 . Need tibial osteotomy time surgery . 8 . Have ACL reconstruction perform less 9 month implant NUsurface® device 9 . Have type previously implant prosthetic meniscus ligament knee implant make plastic . 10 . Have knee flexion contracture > 10 degree 11 . Be unable flex knee 90 degree 12 . Have leg length discrepancy cause noticeable limp . 13 . Have previous major knee condyle surgery 14 . Present insufficiency fracture avascular necrosis medial compartment . 15 . Have active infection tumor . 16 . Have type knee joint inflammatory disease include Sjogren 's syndrome . 17 . Have neuropathic knee osteoarthropathy , also know Charcot joint . 18 . Have medical condition allow arthroscopy point entry knee . 19 . Be pregnant female intend become pregnant study period . 20 . Be mentally incapacitate . 21 . Be prisoner . 22 . Be patient economic incentive improve ( e.g. , workman 's compensation patient ) 23 . Be morbidly Obese ( BMI > 35 ) . 24 . Is unwilling unable Xray , Fluro , MRI affect knee
